record.title: PROVIDING FOR SWEARING IN OF THE HONORABLE ROBERT E. LATTA, OF OHIO, AS A MEMBER OF THE HOUSE
record.narrative:
PROVIDING FOR SWEARING IN OF THE HONORABLE ROBERT E. LATTA, OF OHIO, AS A MEMBER OF THE HOUSE -- (House of Representatives - December 13, 2007)

[Page: H15441]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the gentleman from Ohio, the Honorable Robert E. Latta, be permitted to take the oath of office today.
His certificate of election has not arrived, but there is no contest and no question has been raised with regard to his election.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Ohio?
